recipesJson.name: Sour Blue & White Gummy Ring
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description: This mix is a delightfully refreshing, slightly sour blueberry gummy candy ring. The vanilla swirl brings the recipe together and give it a good amount of body and slightly creamy texture. It's great for an all day vape or use it as a pallet cleanser. It's great off the shake and even better after a 48 hour steep.
